Professional Skills: Stakeholder Management, Cross-functional Collaboration, Agile Methodologies, Design Data Intensive Systems
Software Developer, Haldune | Jun 2025 – Present, Chicago, USA
Key Skills: Agentic Systems, LLM Orchestration, Real-Time Systems, Azure, Kubernetes
Pioneered a high-throughput retrieval system with ChromaDB, unlocking instant data access with sub-100ms lookups.
Deployed the retrieval system as a scalable FastAPI microservice on Kubernetes, designed to support over 10,000 documents.
Led the 'Deep Research Agentic Action' project to synthesize complex data from documents, conversations, and the web into a single, cited report.
Architected a multi-agent workflow on Azure AI Foundry using Microsoft AutoGen, implementing a fan-out/fan-in model for parallel processing.
Cut report generation time by over 70% (from 10 minutes to under 3) by architecting a parallelized 'society of minds' agent philosophy.
Delivered a seamless, real-time conversational AI using Azure Speech SDK and LiveKit, enabling human-like multi-speaker understanding by tracking 15 concurrent users with just 600ms latency.
Research Assistant, Kelley School of Business | Mar 2024 – Dec 2024, Bloomington, USA
Key Skills: AI/LLM Security, Vulnerability Assessment, Risk Mitigation, Nvidia NeMo, Purple Llama
Assessed LLM security using Nvidia Garak, Microsoft Counterfit, and Purple Llama, reporting over 15 vulnerabilities.
Implemented Nvidia NeMo guardrails to mitigate 5 key AI security risks, reducing potential exploit vectors by 60% through targeted prompt filtering and response validation strategies.
Software Engineer Intern, Outspeed | Jun 2024 – Aug 2024, San Francisco, USA
Key Skills: LLM Engineering, Real-Time Systems, AWS, Performance Optimization
Architected a GPU-backed speech-to-speech stack (Whisper STT → Llama 3.1 → Parler TTS) on AWS EKS; load-tested to 80 connections/min.
Designed WebSocket API for the real-time speech-to-speech service, enabling persistent, low-latency connections for downstream client applications.
Fine-tuned Llama-3.1-8B using QLoRA on Chatbot Arena and Orca datasets, improving customer-facing chat quality and multi-step reasoning.
Optimized system performance through Multithreading, data queues and streaming for inter-service communication, bringing latency at p95 700 ms.
Slashed inference costs by ~30% while maintaining a ≤6% quality degradation by replacing high-cost API calls with a self-hosted solution leveraging vLLM and TensorRT on A10G GPUs.
Software Developer Intern, IDeaS | Jul 2022 – Jan 2023, Pune, India
Key Skills: Full-Stack, Big Data Engineering, ETL Pipelines, AWS
Built React/Next.js/Python/Plotly/FastAPI-based analytics platform in collaboration with stakeholders at 5 multi-billion-dollar hospitality clients.
Enabled room pricing suggestion via 15+ KPIs tracked, replacing Excel macros, and saving 100+ engineering hours/month.
Slashed analytics processing time to 33% by architecting a Python multiprocessing data pipeline with fan-out model.
Implemented Jenkins-based CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment to AWS-EC2 and conducted code reviews to ensure a bug-free platform.
Collaborated with cross functional teams to develop Spark/Airflow-based ETL pipeline using AWS S3 Event Notifications and SQS triggers.
Ensured 100% data integrity by implementing 8 critical data validation tests within the ETL, including automated health report emails for officers.
Software Engineer Intern, Quidich Innovation Labs | May 2022 – Jun 2022, Mumbai, India
Key Skills: Machine Learning, Algorithm Development, Cloud

Developed a scikit-learn based Pose Estimation algorithm using drone-captured coordinates and rule-based criteria to predict bowler release points with 97% accuracy, enabling analytics for 130 million Sony Liv viewers.
Deployed the Estimation algorithm to AWS Lambda, achieving 70-100ms processing time for high-stake, real-time live sports analytics on television.
Designed the player tracking system in YOLOv4 by integrating unique ID assignment and memory retention for detected players using Byte Track.
Software Developer Intern, Azodha | Sep 2021 – Apr 2022, New York, USA
Key Skills: Cloud, NLP, MLOps, Infrastructure as Code, Full-Stack
Led the Open-Notif project, developing a CLI for user-company connectivity with AWS(Lambda, SNS, SQS), PostgreSQL, Twilio and Mailchimp.
Collaborated with product managers and healthcare clients to define HIPAA-compliant requirements for Open-Notif.
Implemented IaC by using AWS Chalice to architect and dispatch event-triggered messages, achieving sub-3-second notification delivery.
Built automated unit and integration tests with Pytest, ensuring 99% uptime for the Open-Notif notification system.
Architected the Ringisho app’s NLP framework, deploying BERT models for phrase suggestion and profanity detection, yielding 98% accuracy.
Deployed the Models on GCP Compute Engine with Docker and optimized Rest API for ad-hoc processing.
Crafted a web-based KYC platform leveraging WebAssembly, TensorFlow.js, OpenCV and JavaScript, achieving 90% accuracy in client-side processing and identity verification.
Graduate Teaching Assistant - Elements of AI (Prof. David Leake); ML in Signal Processing (Prof. Jonathan Ponniah)
1st prize - Smart India Hackathon by Dell
4th prize - [Hackathon Name/Details Missing from Source]
87th Rank - Amazon ML challenge by Amazon
INpersona LLM | Skills: NLP, LLM, FullStack Development | Jan 2025 – Apr 2025
Developed an AI assistant using LLaMA 3.2 11B, LlamaIndex, Langchain and ChromaDB with React (TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind CSS).
Reduced LLM latency by 40% with real-time streaming, multi-threaded backend, and dataclass-powered memory for instant, seamless interactions.
Implemented Redis caching for frequently asked questions, reducing response latency from 2000ms to 50ms (97.5% reduction) while decreasing LLM inference calls by 40%
Pioneered hybrid search system using Knowledge Graph(ChromaDB) and HyDE, delivering 10% more precise responses.
FaceInpainting | Skills: Computer Vision, Image Restoration and Algorithm Innovation | Jun 2021 – Jul 2021

Implemented Partial Convolution architecture with PyTorch for image restoration, incorporating a novel approach by leveraging random walk algorithm to generate 50,000 specialized binary masks, preventing overfitting.
Attained an impressive 97% accuracy in precisely reconstructing severely distorted facial features, with training on a dataset of 50,000 images.
Email Reconciliation System | Skills: Full-Stack Development, Data Automation, Google Cloud | Jul 2025 – Aug 2025
Engineered a system to automate expense reconciliation, eliminating manual data entry by leveraging an AI-powered parsing and matching engine.
Delivered intuitive web application using Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS, incorporating Google OAuth for seamless one-click user authentication.
Architected a universal parsing engine with Gemini API achieving 100% data extraction accuracy from receipt photos and bank statements across any bank's Excel format or document structure.

Developed a novel matching algorithm with weighted confidence scoring (amount 50%, date 30%, merchant 20%) that categorizes matches as exact, probable, possible, or uncertain with auto-acceptance at 70% confidence threshold.
Reduced manual reconciliation time by 97% by implementing an automated matching algorithm against the SQLite ledger.
